original_text:
As soon as the chief priests and their officials saw him, they shouted, “Crucify! Crucify!”
But Pilate answered, “You take him and crucify him. As for me, I find no basis for a charge against him.”
korean_text: 대제사장들과 아랫사람들이 예수를 보고 소리 질러 이르되 십자가에 못 박으소서 십자가에 못 박으소서 하는지라 빌라도가 이르되 너희가 친히 데려다가 십자가에 못 박으라 나는 그에게서 죄를 찾지 못하였노라

sentences.original_text: As soon as the chief priests and their officials saw him

sentences.korean_translation: 십자가에 못 박으라! 십자가에 못 박으라!

sentences.original_text: You take him and crucify him
sentences.korean_translation: 너희가 그를 데려다가 십자가에 못 박으라

sentences.original_text: I find no basis for a charge against him
sentences.korean_translation: 나는 그를 고소할 근거를 찾지 못하노라
